storyInfo: Within the chaos, Nian, Dusk, and Shu have to face the question once more: 'Who am I?'

attributes.content: Pitch black.
Unfathomable depth, without a shred of sunlight. The stifling atmosphere almost feels as heavy as the roof's own weight.
The roof of a tomb.
What's going on...? Why am I back here?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wei, old thing, still alive? I came to see you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (Hoarse howl)
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: The sound emanates from behind the heavy door before her.
You've been sleeping for so long, and you're still as pissy as ever...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Drop the scary act already. Can you even do anything after lying here all this time?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hoo...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nothing to be afraid of... right?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shangshu?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Which mountain is this? Why isn't there a single road sign... no, what year is it even?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Judging from the houses by the road, this looks like Shangshu before it went nomadic... why does it look like the city I saw when I first got here?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *ding*— *dong*—
A man hangs from a steep cliff with a rope, engraving a sentence with the hammer and chisel in his hands.
Wei—you, up on the mountain! What'cha doing?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You don't know who I am?!
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Why would I?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It was I who designed and created this city!
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Oh, that's pretty cool.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Catastrophe's about to arrive, and everyone's already evacuated. But the disaster will destroy all the houses I built.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: I can't let it happen just like that!
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The fifth year of Jingyan, when I had just arrived here, and stayed for three decades... 'Record of Shangshu City'?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm carving how I crafted the city onto this cliff so future generations will remember my achievements!
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: But the Catastrophe's just around the corner. You're risking your life for this, but what if a thunderbolt cleaves the mountain into two? Wouldn't your hard work be in vain?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I couldn't care less. This is the only thing I can do. Why even bother living, if no one will know of my feats?
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: How do you even live like that...? Fine, just keep working, I'll disturb you no more.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wei, where does this mountain path lead?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sir, I wish for you to grant me a sword.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: What for?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: To save. To avenge.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: I've told you, my swords don't come cheap. What're you offering?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: My life.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: Again...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...I should've said no already.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Do you hate me for giving you that rusty piece of scrap metal?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What am I saying? This is just an illusion.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But you do remember me.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: Just thinking about that screenplay draft... I still can't help but wonder if the story would've ended differently, had I given you a proper blade then.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How can someone so remarkable and knowledgeable show compassion to a nobody like me?
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: A mere mortal life is honestly worthless to you.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: Hey, don't go that far. I still like you mortals a lot.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You look at us as if you're watching a play.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: Your casual acts can add a little marvel to the show and change the fates of countless people. Sometimes you'll even be in the mood to join us for a few songs.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: But in the myriad of plays, you're the only one offstage.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: You've been alone all along.
attributes.name: Blind Young Swordsman

attributes.content: Jeez, I didn't think I'd get this kind of hallucination...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm tired. Just take the sword. It's made for proper combat.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Let me see if the story ends differently.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sir, a young man asked me to deliver this to package to you before the day of Dongzhi.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Don't have the guts to see me in person?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I suppose... he's passed on by now...
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: The bag is empty.

attributes.text: Countries turn to rust. A brief spark in the wind. A bubble gone without a trace.

attributes.content: What's this...?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Sir, I've been anticipating this for a long time.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: You've been waiting for me?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'm puzzled by something that I'd like you to clarify.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Do elaborate.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I went to collect references at the edge of the city today, and saw an odd fowlbeast perched by the riverbank.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: I've never seen a fowlbeast so beautiful... I was just about to whip out my brush and paper when it flapped its wings and vanished from sight.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: I tried to paint it from what I could remember, but I could not do it.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Just let it go, some things are beyond your control.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: That holds true for others, but I still call myself a painter for the time being... so I'll always want to capture it somehow.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: I've painted quite a lot these past few years. I always thought one had to paint plenty of paintings and see many sights to make life worthwhile.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: But I finally realized... that paintings are ultimately inanimate objects.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The scenes I paint turn into a passing cloud a moment later. The more I paint, the more insignificant I feel my paintings become.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: That's only natural, no?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: One can only dream of seeing the entire land if one won't even make it to a hundred years of age.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: No... I think you still don't understand.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Sir, I'd like to ask for some thoughts on this undeserving work of mine.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Is this a painting?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: My painting.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: This is the view we ignorant mortals see.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Even one like you with all the views you have seen are only a drop in the ocean when compared to the tumultuous changes this land has experienced over the last millennium.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: Please, take a good look once more.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.content: For we only have this one dusk.
attributes.name: Mr. Ruan

attributes.text: Halt brush, wind scroll. As besotted as drunk. One dusk, to ash.

attributes.content: They're growing well...
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: Did you plant all these?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: The people here did.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: As you said, I can't use my abilities to meddle with their growth... I'll disappear one day, but these people will still be here for a long time.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You've worked so hard...
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: It's been a while, Shu.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: How very strange. That brother of mine has been telling me he's seen you in his dreams lately.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Why do you keep thinking about me...? Are you getting nostalgic with age?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: You know how to make fun of me too now.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The people here all remember a 'Shennong' who compiled the twenty-four jieqi solar terms, taught them how to till the land, and even risked her life to cultivate a vast expanse of frozen soil into fertile fields.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: How can I bear that title on my own? We achieved it all together, so why put everything on my shoulders?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: It's been so long, is there still a difference between you or me?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: All I remember is someone taking me in when I was wandering about aimlessly like a child, and giving me a home.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: She told me I needn't care about the differences between man and beast... that I should just live as a human.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to stay here even now.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I promised you I would. To stay and guard this land, so people wouldn't have to go hungry.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Oh, Shu... have you ever resented me?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: A thousand years. How can you call this devotion? This is clearly incarceration...
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: Even though your consciousness is gone, you're still trapped here by your ties to this land, rather than go free.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: All because of one mistake I made...
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I don't resent you for it... only myself. For not going north in your place.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Shu... You know I've never seen you as a Xian, the whole time we were together. I almost forgot that you weren't mortal.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I only realized when we parted ways, I had my own selfish motives, a 'human' selfishness.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I wanted to beg you to stay, to continue helping the people here. All of my kin need you.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: But I wasn't sure if you would love them, as you loved me...
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I'm afraid I've let you down.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: So we failed in the end, right?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: You never found the seeds, and I never managed to grow crops on Originium-tainted soil.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: We couldn't even protect this land.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Man can prevail over nature... but when will that happen for real?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: Shu... Do you regret it?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: You knew that everything I said would come to pass, didn't you?
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: Yes, I always knew.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You shouldn't have met me here.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: You're only a shred of consciousness left in this device, and I'm a memory within.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: I am you.
attributes.name: Indistinct Woman

attributes.content: Ghaah—?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: You're still here.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'm always with you.
attributes.name: 'Free'

attributes.content: A command to want and rage, in greed for life and fear for death.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I nearly forgot why I even created you back then.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: No place of place amidst high mounts or waters far; no matter to me free amidst the human realm.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I've been muddleheaded for so long that I even lost track of why I'm awake.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Who ever said you had to paint the entire realm to be considered an artist? Just paint a realm, and true it be.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The painter brandishes her blade, and mounts rise in succession.
I am me.
And what I see is all.
Wei, wake up.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: A director can't be sleeping on set, right? That's crazy irresponsible.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What's wrong with taking a snooze when you're tired... which one are we shooting this time?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Mecha-Feranmut vs Feranmut.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh. Isn't that the screenplay I stashed away in the bottom of my drawer?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You mean it's that bad...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I swear, this year is the last one.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Anything can be spun into a good story, that's what legends and strange tales are...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I gotta ask, li'l Lava.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What makes you so willing to humor me for so long?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The legendary weapon you promised. When are you going to give it to me?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Sure enough, you're still after that...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Would you miss me, if I were to vanish one day without a trace? For good?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If that day comes, no one will remember you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The weapons, tools, cities, and those films you made will all vanish... you know that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You're right... I shouldn't be seeing you here either.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Yeah, you called it. The dumb stuff I waste time on again and again all amounts to nothing in the end. But I can't help it. I just wanna have some fun and leave some memories behind.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Leave something behind and have fun. That's enough for me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Thanks, li'l Lava. It was pretty fun making trouble with you at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Humiliating... I ended up giving myself a lecture with something I crafted with my own hands.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Letting people go through these old and irrelevant memories just like that is really something...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Well, enough of that. We answered that question when we managed to split off from chaos.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're just a heart. So stop dreaming about taking us back in.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We worked hard to be free from that pitch-black tomb. We're not about to go back to living under your shadow, old thing.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So I'll—
attributes.name: Nian
